description:
A highly-reflective pannier? What a bright idea. This pannier has all the durability and reliability of the classic Back-Roller, but is made with fully reflective fabric to help keep you visible on bike tours and daily commutes. The waterproof fabric and roll-top closure seals out rain and splashes on the inevitable rainy days that happen when you're a regular rider, and the material is PVC-free to make them a better option for people and the environment.

  • PU-coated Cordura nylon fabric is fully reflective and completely waterproof
  • IP64 waterproof rating means these are perfect for rainy weather
  • QL2.1 fixing system for easy installation and removal on your bike rack
  • Fixing system is adjustable to fit your rack
  • Shoulder strap for carrying comfort off the rack, and doubles as a compression strap
  • Fits racks with tubes 16, 12, 10 and 8mm in diameter
  • 3M Scotchlite reflective patches keeps you visible
  • Edge protector prevent premature wear
  • Max load is 9kg
  • Sold individually
name: Ortlieb Back-Roller High-Visibility Pannier
